translations: v．比……活得更久，比……长寿：在时间上超过某人或某物的生命周期。
· He ended up outliving all of his siblings.
最后他比所有的兄弟姐妹都活得更久。

sentences.sentence: And outliving the impact, to find you've pretended.
sentences.translation: 忍受其打击，发现你只是在假装。

sentences.sentence: Love defies time, outliving both its source and its object.
sentences.translation: 爱比时间更久远，比它的源泉和所爱还要不朽。

sentences.sentence: Ultimately, Grand Admiral Grant survived longer than his peers had ever expected, outliving every single one of them.
sentences.translation: 最终，出乎其他帝国元帅的预计，格兰特比他们活得更久。
